requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit processor and operating system is required
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 1700
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended to play the game on low quality settings. Worse hardware is possible.
requirements_en.recommended:

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 570 Series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended to play the game on low quality settings.

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Later
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®10 compliant video card or greater, 2GB video RAM or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default/DirectX 9.0 Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: 32bit windows users need to ensure they have at least 4gb of ram usable on their system.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®10 compliant video card or greater, 4GB video RAM or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default/DirectX 9.0 Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Important - If the graphics look bad go into settings on the In-Game menu and change the graphics quality.
